articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Walmart to roll back some diversity policies amid pressure from conservatives - Reuters.com
articles.description: Walmart plans to cut back some of its diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives, a spokesperson for the retailer said, joining a growing list of firms feeling the heat from conservative groups.

articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge, Lidia Kelly
articles.title: Russia advances in Ukraine at fastest monthly pace since start of war, analysts say - Reuters.com
articles.description: Russian forces are advancing in Ukraine at the fastest rate since the early days of the 2022 invasion, taking an area half the size of Greater London over the past month, analysts and war bloggers say.

articles.title: Tesla would likely be excluded from new California EV tax credits -governor's office says - Reuters
articles.description: Tesla's electric vehicles likely would not qualify for California's new state tax credits under a proposal in the works if President-elect Donald Trump scraps the federal tax credit for EV purchases, Governor Gavin Newsom's office said on Monday.
